"Nostalgia-bait": a term used to describe something that is designed to evoke feelings of nostalgia or longing for the past.
"Emoticonic": a term used to describe an image or symbol that has become so iconic that it is instantly recognizable and associated with a particular emotion.
"Euphori-cation": a term used to describe a feeling of intense happiness or joy that is so overwhelming that it feels like a physical sensation.
"Savory-ness": a term used to describe the quality of something being pleasantly flavorful or satisfying to the taste buds.
"Chroma-phobia": a term used to describe an irrational fear of colors, often characterized by avoidance or anxiety when exposed to certain colors.
